title: LinkedIn Content Extractor Input Schema
description: Input configuration for extracting LinkedIn profile posts and generating comprehensive reports

profileUrl.title: LinkedIn Profile URL
profileUrl.description: The LinkedIn profile URL to scrape (e.g., https://www.linkedin.com/in/username/)

url.title: LinkedIn Profile URL (Alternative field)
url.description: Alternative field for LinkedIn profile URL (same as profileUrl)

email.title: LinkedIn Email (Optional)
email.description: LinkedIn account email for authenticated scraping (provides more complete data)

password.title: LinkedIn Password (Optional)
password.description: LinkedIn account password for authenticated scraping

maxPosts.title: Maximum Posts to Scrape
maxPosts.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape (leave empty for unlimited)

exportFormat.title: Export Format
exportFormat.description: Format for exporting the scraped data

separateFiles.title: Create Separate Files
separateFiles.description: Create separate files for different data types (posts, media, hashtags, etc.)

includeMedia.title: Include Media Information
includeMedia.description: Include media file information in exports

includeEngagement.title: Include Engagement Metrics
includeEngagement.description: Include detailed engagement analysis and metrics

headless.title: Run in Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (recommended for production)

delay.title: Request Delay (ms)
delay.description: Delay between requests in milliseconds to avoid rate limiting

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retries
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed operations

antiDetection.title: Enable Anti-Detection
antiDetection.description: Use stealth techniques to avoid detection
